traits.Amphibious: The froghemoth can breathe air and water.
traits.Shock Susceptibility: If the froghemoth takes lightning damage, it suffers several effects until the end of its next turn: its speed is halved, it takes a \xe2\x88\x922 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, it can't use reactions or Multiattack, and on its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.
